amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 as printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the FCC from using its funding to grant advanced television service licenses unless it directly regulates digital programming or allows broadcasters to bid competitively for such licenses.

action.text: Mr. Bliley raised a point of order against the Frank (MA) amendment (A026). Mr. Bliley stated that the provisions of the amendment constituted legislation on an appropriations bill and as such, violated the Rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
